item.title: 星球大战》演员比利-迪-威廉姆斯（Billy Dee Williams）说，观察《星球大战》的极端粉丝文化是一件 "有趣 "的事。
item.description:
"Star Wars" actor Billy Dee Williams says it's been 'interesting' to observe the franchise's extreme fan culture. pic.twitter.com/fJOveT1rH6

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他坚决支持试管婴儿，并呼吁阿拉巴马州立法者保护这种生育治疗。
item.description:

item.title: 希拉里-斯万克（Hilary Swank）说，抚养一对双胞胎 Aya 和 Ohm 是 "我一生中最大的快乐"。这位 49 岁的演员在去年 4 月宣布了她的 "两个奇迹 "的诞生。她与艾伦-里奇森（Alan Ritchson）合作主演了《平凡天使》（Ordinary Angels）。
item.description:
Hilary Swank says raising twins Aya and Ohm has been "the greatest joy of my life." The 49-year-old actor announced the birth of her "two miracles" last April. She stars in “Ordinary Angels” alongside Alan Ritchson. pic.twitter.com/bZ72zj3XhK

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 23, 2024

item.title: 79 岁的罗德-斯图尔特（Rod Stewart）丝毫没有放慢脚步的迹象，他与朱尔斯-霍兰德（Jools Holland）合作推出了一张全新的摇摆乐专辑。
item.description:
At 79, Rod Stewart shows no signs of slowing down, with a new swing album with Jools Holland https://t.co/mwMPiF0Qyh

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 警方称，他们已经确认了一名佐治亚州护理专业学生死亡事件的 "嫌疑人"，并正在对其进行讯问。这名 22 岁的学生周四被发现死于佐治亚大学校园内，在此之前，她的一位朋友告诉警方，她晨跑后没有回来。
item.description:
Police say they have identified and are questioning a “person of interest” in the death of a Georgia nursing student.

The 22-year-old was found dead on the University of Georgia campus Thursday after a friend told police she had not returned from a morning run. pic.twitter.com/ZyZK42KVSJ

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 23, 2024

The huge streaming numbers for "Suits" on Netflix have led to a spin-off and actor Stephen Amell says he's excited and grateful. pic.twitter.com/3UJHw47Oe8

item.title: 在 95 岁生日这天，洪金宝将自己载入好莱坞史册。在好莱坞中国剧院，这位 "无处不在"（Everything Everywhere All At Once）的演员在水泥地上按下了自己的手印。
item.description:
On his 95th birthday, James Hong cemented himself in Hollywood history. The "Everything Everywhere All At Once" actor put his handprints in cement at Hollywood's Chinese Theatre. pic.twitter.com/W2v0uFQVu9

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 23, 2024

item.title: 阿拉巴马州最高法院作出一项裁决，称根据州法律，冷冻胚胎可被视为儿童，因此该州更多的体外受精服务提供商于周四暂停服务，阿拉巴马州的立法者们开始寻找保护体外受精服务的方法。
item.description:
State legislators in Alabama began looking for ways to protect IVF services as additional in vitro fertilization providers in the state paused services Thursday in the wake of a state Supreme Court ruling that said frozen embryos could be considered children under state law. pic.twitter.com/XOUyfn1LWr

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 普利策奖得主、美联社摄影师 Julio Cortez 将向您展示如何拍摄即将到来的日食。Julio 将分享拍摄日食的技巧和诀窍，随后还将进行问答。欲了解更多信息，包括如何注册：
item.description:
Pulitzer Prize-winning AP photographer Julio Cortez will show you how to capture the upcoming solar eclipse. Julio will share techniques and tips for capturing the eclipse followed by a Q&A session.

For more information, including how to register: https://t.co/DyPsfN2GaF

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 23, 2024
